intro: Are you a good interviewer? You have the most intriguing guest ever, a vampire, but be careful with the question! He's a pretty irascible guest.
description:
Your goal will be to finish the interview without any accident. 

In total, you will have to ask 20 questions to get to know the vampire in depth, but he is very temperamental. So, being careful with the question you choose is crucial. Avoid the vampire getting angry or having a bad reaction. 

Will you be able to prove that you are the best interviewer?
